ing: 1/2 cup crushed ice, or as needed
2 fluid ounces peach-flavored bourbon liqueur (such as Southern Comfort Â®)
2 1/2 fluid ounces sweet tea, or as needed
des: "A mint julep with a twist. If you don't have enough room in your glass for 2.5 ounces of sweet tea, just top it off."
ins: Muddle simple syrup and mint leaves together in a large glass; add ice. Pour in peach-flavored bourbon liqueur, peach schnapps, club soda, and sweet tea. Stir well.
